name: Fly ITAS Chartered Airlines
overview:
Fly ITAS is a low cost holiday chartered airline service based in Dublin Ireland, with support booking offices in Berlin and London, and additional seasonal offices to be opened in Tobago (Caribbean), Grenada (West Indies), and Boa Vista (Brazil) by January 2012.

Founded in December, 2010, Fly ITAS is still in its infant stage and is utilizing a five year charter plan which aims to subsequently transform it from a chartered holiday-passenger service to a full fledge schedule commercial airline.

Because of its unschedule category of passenger service, Fly ITAS operates charter tour packages seasonally, notably during January, April, July, August, November, and December, with flights commencing from Dublin and London to mainly tourism destinations in South America, and to a lesser extent, the Caribbean
